label: Udm: Composite Package
description: (Deprecated) A container of DeploymentPackages that is a DeploymentPackage itself.

properties.name: application
properties.label: Application
properties.description: The application this version belongs to.

properties.name: orchestrator
properties.label: Orchestrator
properties.description: The orchestrators that are used to create the deployment plan. Orchestrators will be applied in order.

properties.name: ignoreUndefinedPropertiesInManifest
properties.label: Ignore Undefined Properties In Manifest
properties.description: Whether to ignore all the undefined properties used in the manifest or to raise an error, while importing a package.

properties.name: exportAllPasswords
properties.label: Export All Passwords
properties.description: If this is true, all password properties are exported as plaintext while exporting the package. If false, exportOnlyPasswordPlaceholders is considered.

properties.name: exportOnlyPasswordPlaceholders
properties.label: Export Only Password Placeholders
properties.description: If this is true, all password properties whose value starts and ends with double curly braces are exported as plaintext. Else, the password values are discarded while exporting the package.

properties.name: packages
properties.label: Packages
properties.description: The DeploymentPackages that make up this CompositePackage.
